title: Interpretation of a dream about promotion in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a promotion at work and a promotion at work is reaching a higher position than a person, and everyone wants to be promoted at work and reach distinction and prestige, but when you see a promotion in a dream, it expresses many things that differ according to the condition of the viewer, for a man and a married woman. And for a single woman, as well as in a pregnant woman’s dream, and through this article we can learn about the most important of these interpretations, according to the opinions of leading scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a promotion at work for a man indicates positive changes in a person’s life. Interpretation of a dream about a military promotion for a married man: It indicates victory over enemies And obtaining a distinguished position. Interpretation of a dream about a father’s promotion at work: The vision indicates the dreamer’s prestigious position. A dream about retirement refers to a girl, widow, or divorced woman who will get married. Interpretation of a dream about a promotion at work by Ibn Sirino. Seeing a promotion at work expresses the diligence in work and the success that the viewer achieves in it, as well as It indicates the achievement of financial stability. Promotion also indicates the qualities of wisdom and patience that God distinguishes. In Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing a promotion at work indicates the acceptance of the dreamer’s prayer. But when he sees that he has been dismissed from his job, this expresses the problems he faces and the obstacles he faces. His way. Also, seeing him being fired from his job indicates the financial loss that he suffers from, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about being promoted at work according to Al-Nabulsi: From the point of view of Imam Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, seeing a promotion at work indicates the appearance of pleasant things in the life of the dreamer or around his family, and it may also express About success and achieving goals. Promotion also indicates happy news, joy and happiness. As for dismissal from work, it expresses abandoning or shortening prayer, and a message for a person to return to the path of truth and return to God Almighty. Seeing separation from work can also indicate loss and failure in the life of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a promotion at work for a pregnant woman. When a pregnant woman sees a promotion in her dream, this indicates the ease of childbirth. It also expresses the safety of herself and her fetus and giving birth without any problems. The vision of a pregnant woman being promoted also expresses her interest and care from the family and relatives, especially the husband during the pregnancy period. Seeing a promotion in a dream for a pregnant woman also indicates that her child will have a great relationship in the future and will be successful and distinguished. Interpretation of a dream about a promotion at work for single people When she sees a promotion in an unmarried girl’s dream, this indicates piety, good qualities, and good morals. And if she gets a promotion In her job or received a reward, this indicates her approach to marriage. A promotion in a dream indicates that she will bear responsibility and be able to overcome crises in her life. It also indicates his success and ability to achieve the goals he desires. As for seeing separation from the uncle, it indicates On the problems and obstacles she faces in her life. Or it can express the loss of a loved one or failure in something. Interpretation of a dream about a promotion at work for a married woman. A vision...

And if you get a promotion in Her job or she got a bonus, this indicates her approach to marriage. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a spoon in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a spoon in a dream. Spoons, forks, and knives are widely used in kitchen utensils and are necessary in every kitchen. It is certain that seeing spoons in a dream has many different meanings and meanings, such as seeing spoons. In a dream, it indicates luck, joy, happiness, pleasant surprises, and a pregnant woman giving birth to a beautiful girl. Seeing spoons in a dream indicates an abundance of food, which is very good for the viewer. Follow us. A dream about seeing a spoon by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing spoons in a dream is because it generally indicates good luck for the dreamer. Seeing spoons in a dream also indicates success in life. Seeing spoons in a dream means that good news and joy are coming. Seeing spoons in the dining room indicates a happy life. Seeing an unmarried woman buying spoons in a dream means that she is ready for an important happy event in her life. Buying spoons indicates that he will travel or get married. To dream of eating with a spoon means good luck. If you see an empty spoon in a dream for an unmarried woman, this means that she wasted her time on trivial matters. And to see food such as beans or rice with a spoon, this indicates strength and power. A dream about seeing a spoon for a married woman: Seeing many spoons in a married woman’s kitchen indicates that she enjoys good people. Seeing many spoons in a married woman’s dream indicates an abundance of wealth and goodness. Seeing a clean and beautiful spoon in a dream is a good vision and indicates the fulfillment of desires. Also, seeing a spoon in a dream is a good vision and indicates the fulfillment of desires. A spoon in a married woman’s dream symbolizes a good and loyal servant. A pregnant woman’s dream of seeing a spoon. Seeing a pregnant woman eating food with a spoon indicates easy birth. Seeing a silver spoon indicates the birth of a girl. Seeing a golden spoon indicates the birth of a boy. Dreaming of a man seeing a spoon. Seeing a golden spoon In a man’s dream, it is an indication of his profits in business or trade. Seeing a spoon in a man’s dream indicates the presence of a woman. Seeing an unmarried man buying a spoon in a dream indicates his marriage. Dreaming of seeing a spoon for a married woman. Seeing a new spoon in a married woman’s dream indicates an imminent pregnancy. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is taking a spoon from her husband, this indicates his great love for her, his sincerity, and his appreciation for her. But if she sees in her dream that she is taking a copper spoon, this is not good as it is a sign of worries and sorrows, and an indication of the possibility of harm and harm. The dream of seeing a spoon The Dead: Seeing the deceased offering an offering to the living is a desirable vision, and indicates goodness for him, abundant livelihood, the dreamer’s good condition, and abundance of benefits for him. When a dead person gives the dreamer a small spoon, this is a sign of sustenance, but after fatigue, and it may be money, but it is little. Seeing a dead person giving a spoon A large one in a dream indicates great kindness and abundant money. Also, seeing the deceased giving a person many spoons indicates the abundance of goodness that he will receive, the payment of his debts, the abundance of goodness for him, and the removal of worry and distress. Seeing the deceased giving the fortuneteller a spoonful of food is evidence of the abundance of food. His financial conditions improved

title: Interpretation of the death of brothers in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of the death of brothers in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. The death of loved ones in a dream is an annoying and frightening dream that makes the dreamer believe that there is a danger that could harm those who live with him, or that he could be exposed to a situation of loss and loss to someone or something crucial to his life in reality. General In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing the death of brothers in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the death of an older brother and crying over him in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the death of an older brother and crying over him brings good and evil, and the most important thing in this vision can be identified through The following: Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing the dreamer of the death of the older brother and crying over him by burning is a sign of getting rid of all the enemies who are waiting for him and wishing him failure, loss and death. Shaheen agreed with Al-Nabulsi that the death of the older brother is a sign of deliverance from near evil, great hardship and destruction. Great. Some said that seeing the death of an older brother is a sign of death or evil for the dreamer, or the dream may be a sign of countless good money from unknown sources. Ibn Sirin confirmed that crying in a dream without barking or howling is a sign of good news for the dreamer, It indicates freedom from poverty. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the death of brothers in a dream. Dream interpreters worked hard to find correct and clear explanations about the death of brothers. The most important issues that raised controversy over the dream of the death of two brothers can be summarized as follows: The death of brothers in a dream generally portends good. If the dream is free of lamentation, screaming, and slapping on the cheeks, it means victory over the enemy, defeat of opponents, and great success in various areas of life. And big profits. In this world. A sick person who sees this dream means a near recovery, good health, a strong body, and a good health condition. Ibn Sirin confirmed that the interpretation of the dream could be that the dreamer is jealous of him, and this vision is a sign of the fall of envy and the evil eye. And death Hidden brothers are evidence of a successful and happy marriage, and for a married woman, evidence of good morals between her and her husband, and for a divorced woman and a widow, evidence of her good behavior. Anxiety and problems, and the pregnant woman indicates that the months of pregnancy will pass without fatigue, provided that crying is not followed by screaming. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the death of a brother in an accident in a dream. All dream interpreters agreed that the death of a brother in general in a dream is a sign of a soon-to-be marriage for the girl, good conditions and married life. For a married or unmarried woman, imminent pregnancy for a non-pregnant woman, and the birth of the expected child without fatigue for the pregnant woman, which means that this dream brings goodness to the one who has a conditional vision. By drowning and crying sadly, this is a sign of a bad omen, or in a clearer sense that the dream revolves around a machine that is contrary to what came before, meaning the failure of the girl’s emotional life and her commitment, and the problems and disagreements between the spouses. The newborn is not in good health or a difficult birth for the pregnant woman, failure in work and studies, loss of business, and slapping of the cheeks carry all the previous negative interpretations. Interpretation of a dream I saw that my brother died and

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about flying solo according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a singles’ trip: It is considered one of the visions that indicate the future and the events it holds. It also describes the dreamer and expresses a dreamy personality with many ambitions and hopes, but it can also indicate exposure to some psychological and health crises. . Or social problems, or they warn us of danger and inform us of the need to escape quickly to save ourselves. Interpretation of a dream about a single flight. What is the interpretation of a dream about flying solo? Flying in real life indicates freedom and the desire to enjoy life and move forward towards goals, so this vision expresses a personality that loves a full life. With energy. If an unmarried woman sees herself flying and then stands in a certain place, this indicates that there is a person from that place who loves her and wants to marry her. Also, flying with wings, expressing a successful personality in her life, and doing her work correctly, which made her always excel at Her colleagues at work. As for flying in a means of transportation, such as planes or balloons, it expresses the acquisition of large sums of money or improving the standard of living without interference or hard effort. It can also indicate that she is going through bad psychological conditions and wants to escape from her surroundings and go to a better place where she feels stable. And security. She also shows attractive personality traits such as cheerfulness, vitality, and the desire to make everyone around her happy and help them achieve their hopes in life. The Dream Interpretation section on the Egyptian website, from Google, contains thousands of interpretations that you are looking for. What is the interpretation of a dream about flying solo according to Ibn Sirin? Says Ibn Sirin She will see that this vision often reflects the feelings of the dreamer or explains some of the characteristics that distinguish him, depending on the method and means of the journey. If she sees that she is flying high in happiness, this expresses an extraordinary personality that is not defeated by obstacles and crises. She trusts herself and her abilities and moves steadily towards her goals. If she uses one of the means of flying, she shows a hasty personality in making important decisions without thinking, which makes her regret it often. The most important interpretations of a dream about a flight for singles. Interpretation of a dream about flying without wings for individuals. This vision indicates the emergence of many positive changes in the life of the visionary in The coming period without the slightest interference from her. It also expresses her approach to achieving her goals and dreams that she desired, worked hard for and put in a hard time and effort for. It also expresses that she is a distinguished personality and has many skills and abilities that enable her to get the best jobs. It also expresses that It indicates that she will marry a good man with a high degree of wealth who will provide her with a life of comfort and luxury in the future. But if he flies close distances and avoids falling, this indicates that he desires to fulfill many desires, but he fears failure and does not have the courage to implement them. Interpretation A dream of flying over the sea for single people. This vision often portends success and international fame that reaches the furthest limits. Perhaps the owner of the vision will be able to make a discovery or invention that will benefit

title: Interpretation of a dream about roses

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about roses in a dream on our website Moments Roses are one of the most beautiful gifts that can be given on any occasion, whether it is an engagement, wedding, birthday, or other occasions. Red, violet, pink and many other colors, but all of these colors are in our reality, so seeing roses in our dreams has the same interpretation and the same happiness and joy, or dream interpreters have another opinion on this vision, this we will deal with in detail through this article. Interpretation of a dream Seeing roses by Ibn Sirin The leading scholars and dream interpreters have reached the conclusion that roses in dreams indicate love, loyalty, and honesty in general. Whoever sees in a dream that he is offering roses to his parents or one of his brothers, this is evidence of kinship and a strong family relationship. As for whoever sees a wilted rose in his dream This is a sign of illness or failure. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is watering roses, this is evidence that the dreamer is doing a good deed. Interpretation of the dream of seeing roses by Nabulsi. Nabulsi mentioned about the dreamer who sees himself picking roses, this is evidence that he will receive love and affection from those around him. As for whoever sees himself smelling the scent of yellow roses, this indicates that he is kissing a sick woman. Interpretation of a dream about roses for single women. Roses in general in an unmarried woman’s dream are evidence and evidence that she has pure emotion and also indicate joy and pleasure for the dreamer. If an unmarried woman sees roses A white rose in her dream, this means that the dreamer will propose marriage to her, and he is a person with morals and kindness. However, if an unmarried woman sees in her dream a red rose with thorns, wounds, or scratches, this is a sign and warning to the woman of the vision that someone is approaching her, causing her injury. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is sleeping next to roses, this indicates happiness and love. However, if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is picking roses, this is evidence that she will reap the fruits of her love through marriage or knowing success. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is picking roses, this is evidence that she will reap the fruits of her love through marriage or knowing success. If a married woman sees roses in her dream and suffers from problems and crises, this indicates optimism, hope, and the near end of crises and problems. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband gives her roses A gift, this indicates that there is a problem between her and her husband, and this is evidence of reconciliation. But if a married woman sees white roses in her dream, this is a sign of the loss of anxiety and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about roses for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees white roses in her dream, this is a sign that she She will give birth without problems and pain and her child will be healthy. But if a pregnant woman sees a single rose in her dream, this is a sign that she will give birth to a female. But if the pregnant woman sees that someone gave her a gift of roses, this is evidence of her friendship with her. Giving roses to someone is also As a gift from a pregnant woman, it also indicates the existence of a relationship between the person seen and this person. But if the pregnant woman sees it in h

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a father committing adultery in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a father committing adultery in a dream. If you ask about what scholars have narrated about the interpretation of a dream about seeing a father committing adultery in a dream, all of these and more are the details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a father committing adultery in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a father committing adultery in a dream can indicate things The bad, and God knows the unseen. These interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about giving a light in a dream. Seeing a lighter gift in a dream may indicate advice that the dreamer could receive from one of the people at that time, and God knows best. Seeing a lighter gift in a dream may indicate a desire to get rid of a sin or a bad thing that the dreamer does During those days, he must ask God for help. It is possible that seeing the gift of a lighter in a dream indicates the presence of competition or hostility in the life of the dreamer, and he must get rid of it. Seeing receiving a lighter as a gift in a dream may indicate harm that the dreamer may suffer during This period and he must seek help from God. Seeing a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream may indicate a happy event coming to the family in those days, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about hair coming out of the mouth by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: It also indicates that a person has a long life and can be exposed to many diseases, and in the following lines of our website we will explain the vision of hair coming out of the mouth in all details. Interpretation of seeing hair coming out of the mouth in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that hair is coming out of her mouth. This dream indicates that there are companions who speak ill of her. They also do not like her well, and that this girl will face many problems in her life. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that long hair is coming out of her mouth. This vision indicates that this single girl will get married soon. The qualities of the young man are good, and they will live a life full of joy and happiness. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is vomiting and during vomiting hair comes out of the mouth. This vision shows that this unmarried girl is suffering from an illness and that she will recover from this illness in the coming period, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is removing hair from the mouth of someone she knows. This dream indicates that she will be in a relationship with this person. She will marry him soon, and her life will be beautiful full of joy and happiness. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is working and in the dream Pulling her hair out of her mother's mouth. This indicates that this unmarried girl will get an important position and that a special job for her will continue for long periods. As for if the unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is pulling some hair out of her mouth. This indicates that there are people in her life who do not want her well. They speak badly of her, and she was not there, so they must be careful and wary of them. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that a lot of hair is coming out of her mouth. It shows that she will face many bad conditions and worries. But she can get rid of these conditions as soon as possible. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that hair is coming out of someone's mouth. This vision indicates the joy and happiness that she will get and that you will feel psychological comfort in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of seeing hair in a dream and its importance for Imam al-Sadiq Interpretation of seeing hair coming out of the mouth in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream that she is pulling hair out of her mouth, then that woman also vomits. This vision indicates that this woman will go through many bad conditions. She will get rid of these bad conditions as soon as possible. When a married woman dreams that she Eating her hair, she puts the hair in her mouth. This indicates that this woman has a healthy and strong body free of diseases. If a married woman dreams that she cuts her hair and eats it. This vision shows that this woman will do something that she could not do, but she backs down from this decision because of her sexual impotence. As for if a married woman sees in her dream that there is white hair in her mouth. This dream indicates that this woman is dealing with many worries and sorrows. And problems that cause her stress in her life, but she can soon get rid of these problems. When a married woman sees in her dream that a lot of hair is

preview.html: It is said that beating is advice or assistance to someone who loves the dreamer, provided that the beating does not cause serious harm or death, or result in injury or bleeding for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing beating in a dream for a single girl. Seeing beating in a dream for an unmarried girl means that beating is good and beneficial, and God knows best. Whoever sees a stranger hitting her in a dream, she needs someone to help her and advise her, and God knows best. Seeing a sudden beating without the aggressor’s knowledge means that the dreamer is alerted to things that he neglects, and God knows best. If a girl sees during her sleep that she is hitting someone she knows, this is evidence of helping him and satisfying a need for him, and God knows best. Beating a stranger in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s success in her quest for something in her life, and God knows best. See also: Dream interpretation of beating in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing beating in a dream for a married woman. Seeing beating in a married woman’s dream indicates benefit and abundance. And severe beating explains trouble. And a large number of family problems. If a woman dreams that her husband is beating her, then he is offering her something that will benefit her. A man hitting his wife may indicate defending her rights. A woman was severely beaten by her husband in a dream. It is interpreted by a man disciplining his wife and reprimanding her for inappropriate behavior. A woman hitting her son in a dream is a sign of his kindness and upbringing. Whoever sees her son hitting her with extreme violence is a sinner, and God knows best. The dreamer was beaten by a stranger in a dream, is evidence that there are those who pray for her in the unseen. And hitting in front of people is a slander, and God knows best. Interpretation Seeing a man being beaten in a dream and its meaning. Seeing a man being beaten in a dream means entering into a successful and profitable partnership. You will get a lot of money from the beater, and God knows best. The dreamer hitting his wife in a dream is evidence of buying clothes for her or advising her. Guidance for her and her children, and God knows best. If he is exposed If a person is beaten by an unknown person in a dream, then one may enter into a competition or compete with someone in his field of work. A wife hitting her husband in a dream is evidence of her honesty and devotion to serving and obeying him. It was also said that a man can take her money, and God knows best. Beating even Death in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will be severely harmed by an evil person and it may harm work and livelihood, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about being beaten by the hand. The meaning of seeing being beaten in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. It is said that hitting a pregnant woman in a dream is a good sign to facilitate her pregnancy and childbirth, God willing. When a woman dreams A pregnant woman is hit by a stranger, then this is a sign that her birth is imminent, and God knows best. Harmful beatings in a dream do not deserve praise, especially if they see bleeding, which indicates a miscarriage or a birth disorder. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that her mother or sister is beating her, then she will help her. And take care of her during pregnancy and childbirth, God willing. A husband hitting a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence that her husband will give her a precious gift immediately after she gives birth, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a beating in a dream for young men and its meaningIbn Shaheen Al-Zahiri says: Beating in a young man’s sleep. It is interpreted as kindness and benefit if known. The dreamer is from the beating of him, and God knows best. And the severe beating is from the unknown

title: Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile eating a child

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile eating a child. Today, let us learn all the details about the crocodile, and whether they are good or bad dreams, so let us end them today in detail. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile eating a child in a dream. Seeing a child eating a crocodile in a dream is a sign of failure in life. If one sees a child eating a crocodile in a dream, this A sign that desires and dreams will not come true. When a man sees a crocodile eating a child in a dream, this indicates a loss of self-confidence. A dream about a crocodile eating a small child is a sign of his faith in Almighty God. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile in a dream Seeing a crocodile in a dream is a sign of bad morals. From He saw a crocodile in a dream and remained oppressed, this is a sign that his affairs will be exposed. A merchant’s dream is a crocodile, an indication of financial crises that will happen to him. If a man sees a crocodile in a dream, this indicates his short life. Dreaming of a crocodile in a dream is a sign of immorality and immorality in the dreamer Whoever sees a crocodile in his dream is a sign of major crises that will happen to him in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile eating a snake in a dream. Seeing a crocodile eating a snake in a dream is a sign of magic and sorcery. Dreaming about a snake that a crocodile eats is a sign of deception and fraud. Whoever dreams of a crocodile eating A snake in a dream indicates victory over enemies and victory over them. When you see a crocodile eating a snake in a dream, this indicates that evil is conspiring against him. Anyone who sees a crocodile eating a snake in a dream is a sign of the fear and anxiety that the person feels in reality. Interpretation of Dreams I dreamed that I gave birth to a crocodile. If a girl sees that she gave birth to a crocodile, then this is a sign of injustice being done to her. Seeing a crocodile in a dream is a sign of the loss of a loved one. Whoever sees that he gives birth to a crocodile and is afraid of it, it is a sign of crises entering his life and he will draw from them. Seeing a birth A crocodile and approaching it is a sign of deception by your enemy who is close to you. Interpretation of a dream about seeing crocodile eggs in a dream. Anyone who sees crocodile eggs in a dream is a sign of abundant nutrition. Dreaming of crocodile eggs in a dream is a sign of physical strength and freedom from disease. Anyone who sees crocodile eggs in a dream It is a sign that a person will get rid of problems and crises in his life. If a person sees crocodile eggs in a dream, this is a sign of his courage. Interpretation of dreams: I dreamed that I killed a crocodile in a dream. Seeing a crocodile killed in a dream is a sign of victory over enemies. Whoever sees that he kills a crocodile in A dream, which indicates that he will escape from his enemy near him. The dream of killing a crocodile in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals. If one sees that he is killing a crocodile and stripping it of its skin, this is a sign of the abundance of food that he will soon receive. Interpretation of a dream about a green crocodile: Seeing a green crocodile in The dream is evidence that he should get his ban. Seeing a green crocodile in a dream is a sign of his morals. If one sees a small green crocodile in a dream, this indicates problems and crises that he will soon solve. Dream of a green crocodile
